definition: nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on

sentences.english: You have to use strength and skill to pound these long nails in.
sentences.chinese: 要敲進這些長釘子，你既得有力氣，又得有技巧。

sentences.english: This long nail went right through the plank.
sentences.chinese: 這根長釘子完全穿透了木板。

sentences.english: Water-proof clothing and spiked shoes are fairly recent innovations.
sentences.chinese: 防水服和長釘鞋只是近代的發明。

sentences.english: Bare feet, spikes and footwear with screw-in studs are not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 光腳，長釘鞋和有螺旋鐵釘的球鞋是不允許的。

sentences.english: As another spike was readied , I knew I could watch no more.
sentences.chinese: 當另一個長釘準備好時，我知道我不可能再看下去了。
